description: Build powerful Web APIs with DRF: Serializers, ViewSets, and Routers.

slides.title: What is DRF? üîå
slides.content:
# APIs made easy

**Django REST Framework** is a powerful toolkit for building Web APIs.

It handles content negotiation (JSON/XML), authentication, permission, and serialization out of the box.

slides.title: Serializers
slides.content:
# Converting Data üîÑ

Serializers convert complex data (like QuerySets) into Python datatypes that can be rendered into JSON.

<!-- FULL_CODE_START
from rest_framework import serializers
from .models import Person

class PersonSerializer(serializers.ModelSerializer):
    class Meta:
        model = Person
        fields = '__all__'
FULL_CODE_END -->

slides.title: Deserialization
slides.content:
# Validation Logic ‚úÖ

Serializers also handle deserialization: validating incoming data before saving it to the database.

`serializer.is_valid()` checks types and constraints.

slides.title: API Views
ViewSets
slides.content:
# All-in-One üì¶

A ViewSet combines logic for a set of related views (list, create, retrieve, update, destroy).

<!-- FULL_CODE_START
class UserViewSet(viewsets.ModelViewSet):
    queryset = User.objects.all()
    serializer_class = UserSerializer
FULL_CODE_END -->

slides.title: Concept Quiz
slides.quizQuestion: Which component in DRF is responsible for converting model instances to JSON?

slides.title: Routers
slides.content:
# Auto Wiring üîÄ

Routers automatically generate URL conf for ViewSets.

<!-- FULL_CODE_START
from rest_framework import routers
router = routers.DefaultRouter()
router.register(r'users', UserViewSet)

urlpatterns = router.urls
FULL_CODE_END -->

Creates `/users/`, `/users/{id}/`, etc.

slides.title: Authentication
slides.content:
# Who are you? üÜî

DRF supports multiple auth schemes:
- SessionAuthentication (Browser)
- BasicAuthentication
- TokenAuthentication
- JWT (Third party)

slides.title: Permissions
slides.content:
# Can you do this? üõë

Control access.

- `AllowAny`
- `IsAuthenticated`
- `IsAdminUser`
- `IsAuthenticatedOrReadOnly`

`permission_classes = [IsAuthenticated]`

slides.title: Pagination
slides.content:
# Handling Lists üìÑ

Don't return 1,000,000 rows.

Configure `PAGE_SIZE` in settings.

`http://api.example.org/users/?page=4`

slides.title: Routing Quiz
slides.quizQuestion: What is the primary benefit of using a DRF Router with a ViewSet?
quizOptions: It automatically generates standard URL patterns for CRUD operations

slides.title: Summary
slides.content:
# Recap: DRF üöÄ

Build APIs fast.

- **Serializer:** Model <-> JSON.
- **ViewSet:** Logic controller.
- **Router:** URL Handling.
- **Permissions:** Security layer.
